document.full_text: doc rivers has agreed to a five-year contract extension as celtics coach, a deal that would keep him in boston to help rebuild the franchise when 'the big three' era is done.
document.title: rivers gets 5-year extension as coach of celtics
lines_and_colors: doc rivers has agreed to a five-year contract extension as celtics coach, a deal that would keep him in boston to help rebuild the franchise when 'the big three' era is done.
